backend/main.mo: Defines booking, provider, rental, and user profile types with compare functions, manages state in maps, and exposes profile read/write APIs with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence for updating the app to use the latest Eyegic logo asset, listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files, detailing UI changes, animations, and logo updates.
frontend/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the main application layout and defines all routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders an access‑denied message with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout handling using Internet Identity with UI state reflecting auth status.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireLogi: Wraps protected content, showing a login prompt when the user is unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Displays a styled badge for a booking status using predefined label and variant mappings.
Shows the Eyegic logo using the latest generated asset with size‑based class variants.
frontend/src/components/forms/OptionalPh: Allows optional image upload with preview and removal controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Provides a page wrapper with optional title/description and configurable max‑width.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with navigation sections, branding, and a dynamic copyright link referencing caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Displays the site header with logo, navigation links, login controls, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useBooking.t: Fetches a single booking by ID using the actor and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateOpt: Creates an optician booking via the actor and invalidates customer booking queries.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRen: Creates a rental booking and refreshes customer booking data.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRep: Creates a repair booking with provided details and invalidates customer bookings.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCustomerB: Retrieves all bookings for the current customer using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useProviderB: Fetches provider-specific bookings for the logged-in provider.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useUpdateBoo: Updates a booking's status and invalidates related booking queries.
Loads provider data for the authenticated identity and provides a mutation to onboard new providers.
frontend/src/hooks/rentals/useRentalCata: Fetches the rental item catalog from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/BookingDetai: Displays detailed information for a specific booking, including status, service details, address, and preferred time.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/mobile-optic: Presents confirmation details for a completed mobile optician booking with service info, time, and price summary.
Provides a form for creating a mobile optician booking, handling service selection, pricing, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Shows a logged‑in user's list of bookings with status, schedule, location, and navigation to booking details.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/rentals/Rent: Shows confirmation details for a rental booking including address, rental info, fees, and navigation options.
Page for creating a rental booking, collecting duration and address, calculating price, and submitting via API.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/repairs/Repa: Displays confirmation and details of a submitted repair request, loading the booking and showing its status.
Form for submitting a repair request with type, details, address, time, and computed price, then creating the booking.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with hero section, service listings, and steps overview using navigation and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderDash: Provider dashboard showing profile and assigned bookings, with ability to update booking status.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderOnbo: Form for providers to register by entering personal info, service areas, and offered services.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalItemDet: Shows rental item details including pricing and availability, with navigation back to the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalsCatalo: Displays the rental catalog with search, category filtering, and item availability indicators.
frontend/src/pages/services/MobileOptici: Shows details about the mobile optician service, listing features and offering a booking CTA.
Introduces the eyewear rental service with benefits, visuals, and navigation to the catalog.
Describes repair services offered, lists available fixes, and provides a booking button.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend styling system.
project_state.json: Describes the Eyegic project’s current state, architecture notes, known UI/logo issues, and active features for an on-demand eyewear services marketplace. Indicates this snapshot is a fix request with details on layout, logo, and hero-section problems.
